segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Use the information in this section when you plan for creating the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 recovery image.
segment.target: Use the information in this section when you plan for creating the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 recovery image.

segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 7 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 7 Recovery Image

segment.source: When you create the DaRT recovery image, you have to decide which tools to include on the image.
segment.target: When you create the DaRT recovery image, you have to decide which tools to include on the image.

segment.source: When you make that decision, remember that end users might have access occasionally to the various DaRT tools.
segment.target: When you make that decision, remember that end users might have access occasionally to the various DaRT tools.

segment.source: For more information about the DaRT tools, see Overview of the Tools in DaRT 7.0.
segment.target: For more information about the DaRT tools, see Overview of the Tools in DaRT 7.0.

segment.source: For more information about how to help create a secure recovery image, see Security Considerations for DaRT 7.0.
segment.target: For more information about how to help create a secure recovery image, see Security Considerations for DaRT 7.0.

segment.source: When you create the DaRT recovery image, you will also specify whether you want to include additional drivers or files.
segment.target: When you create the DaRT recovery image, you will also specify whether you want to include additional drivers or files.

segment.source: Determine the locations of any additional drivers or files that you want to include on the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Determine the locations of any additional drivers or files that you want to include on the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Prerequisites
segment.target: Prerequisites

segment.source: The following items are required or recommended for creating the DaRT recovery image:
segment.target: The following items are required or recommended for creating the DaRT recovery image:

segment.source: Windows 7 source files
segment.target: Windows 7 source files

segment.source: You must provide the path of a Windows 7 DVD or of Windows 7 source files.
segment.target: You must provide the path of a Windows 7 DVD or of Windows 7 source files.

segment.source: Windows 7 source files are required to create the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Windows 7 source files are required to create the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Windows Debugging Tools for your platform
segment.target: Windows Debugging Tools for your platform

segment.source: Windows Debugging Tools are required when you run Crash Analyzer to determine the cause of a computer crash.
segment.target: Windows Debugging Tools are required when you run Crash Analyzer to determine the cause of a computer crash.

segment.source: We recommend that you specify the path of the Windows Debugging Tools at the time that you create the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: We recommend that you specify the path of the Windows Debugging Tools at the time that you create the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: If it is necessary, you can download the Windows Debugging Tools here: Download and Install Debugging Tools for Windows.
segment.target: If it is necessary, you can download the Windows Debugging Tools here: Download and Install Debugging Tools for Windows.

segment.source: Optional: Standalone System Sweeper definitions
segment.target: Optional: Standalone System Sweeper definitions

segment.source: The latest definitions for the Standalone System Sweeper are required when you run this tool.
segment.target: The latest definitions for the Standalone System Sweeper are required when you run this tool.

segment.source: Although you can download the definitions when you run Standalone System Sweeper, we recommend that you download the latest definitions at the time you create the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Although you can download the definitions when you run Standalone System Sweeper, we recommend that you download the latest definitions at the time you create the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: In this manner, you can still run the tool with the latest definitions even if the problem computer does not have network connectivity.
segment.target: In this manner, you can still run the tool with the latest definitions even if the problem computer does not have network connectivity.

segment.source: Optional: Windows symbols files for use with Crash Analyzer
segment.target: Optional: Windows symbols files for use with Crash Analyzer

segment.source: Typically, debugging information is stored in a symbol file that is separate from the executable.
segment.target: Typically, debugging information is stored in a symbol file that is separate from the executable.

segment.source: You must have access to the symbol information when you debug an application that has stopped responding, for example if it crashed.
segment.target: You must have access to the symbol information when you debug an application that has stopped responding, for example if it crashed.

segment.source: For more information, see Diagnosing System Failures with Crash Analyzer.
segment.target: For more information, see Diagnosing System Failures with Crash Analyzer.

segment.target: Related topics
